name: AWA
description: A fast paced shoot-em-up featuring modern military aircraft. Choose one of the eight fighter aircraft and take the battle to the skies throughout nine action-packed stages each with their own end-level special boss.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Dual Core Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I5 2500k/AMD FX 8350 Graphics: Geforce GTX 560/Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Very buggy, couldnt progress past 2nd level because the game would lock up. Upon defeating the boss in level 2, it would completely freeze at the screen that shows how many enemies you killed. I had to tab out and back into the game to get the option to exit. When i restarted the game a selected a different aircraft my movement keys would not respond...i dont feel like messing with it anymore...
Fast paced shmup with responsive controls and old school gameplay. The loadout before each mission is a nice touch.
